post.body: he he he you are welcome. . . I have prefected my native american snow dance over the years. . . Think this was my best one yet
LMAO! @bryce724 thats funny but dude its more like 45 inces and xounting
I totally got my brothe bryce a twitter account. . . Whoot go @bryce724
Trying to get my brother bryce addicted to twitter
Watching The Marine with John Cena. . . He is hot. . .and pigging out with my bro
Omg they have a slap shot 3!!!!!!,
Bryce and i are renting movies for our friday night....love family
Its snowing again. . . . :S
Drawing my tattoo for tomorrow
Back home with the bounty of our pilliging he he. . . I got some sweet pic frames and more broadway musical soundtracks :)
A good day of money spending topped off with a stap at zips!
Tasha just made the store strip a dummy to get a pair of pants. . . Good i love my family. . .i love being home. .
Sweet salvation. . .tasha and i are going shopping. .. .
Eating left over deviled eggs. . yummy
Waking up
Has not snown for about 8 hours now. . Off to bed. . Peace love all
bored.....
Wondering if i should go out side and play
Oh i cant wait to eat dinner. . .
Off to snow blow grandmas driveway
